name: Achievement Hunter: Foxy
description:
Achievement Hunter: Foxy

In this 2d action / shooter you will play for the fox who wants to stop the enemies who are trying to destroy his house.
You do not have any friends. There are only you, your weapons and a huge number of enemies.
Fight for your home, increase your skill, upgrade weapons and prevent invasion of enemies into your house.

Game features:
  • Minimum allowable price
  • Cartoon design
  • Real weapons
  • Fearless protagonist
